author: Special Correspondent
text:
Pattali Makkal Katchi youth wing leader and Chief Ministerial candidate on Monday alleged that AIADMK functionaries were responsible for the alleged assault on his party’s Cuddalore north district secretary Arumugam and his supporters.

On Saturday night while Mr. Arumugam and six others were travelling by an SUV from Neyveli to Panruti, a gang in three cars waylaid them at Kizhkollai and assaulted them with sickles and iron rods, and fled.

Mr. Arumugam and his supporters were admitted to Jipmer in Puducherry.

Dr. Anbumani visited the partymen at the hospital on Monday and spoke to their family members.
title: AIADMK men attacked my party cadre: Anbumani
